title: System Of A Down - Toxicity - CD remaster by MC Lurken 16-bit 44
description:
System Of A Down - Toxicity - CD remaster by MC Lurken (a.k.a. Beavis39)




!!!!!!!!!!!!!THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL REMASTER, THIS IS A FAN RELEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL REMASTER, THIS IS A FAN RELEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL REMASTER, THIS IS A FAN RELEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!



1 - Prison Song
2 - Needles
3 - Deer Dance
4 - Jet Pilot
5 - X
6 - Chop Suey!
7 - Bounce
8 - Forest
9 - Atwa
10 - Science
11 - Shimmy
12 - Toxicity
13 - Psycho
14 - Aerials


Setup:
-HP G72-250US
-Intel Core i3 M350 2.27GHz
-8Gb PC3-10700 RAM
-Win7 64-bit SP1
-SB X-Fi Surround 5.1

Process:
-16-bit/44.1kHz files ripped from the CD and joined in Wavelab 6
-DC offset removed, this will yield a file with a bit depth of 18-24 bits
-Resample to 384kHz in Wavelab w/crystal resampler ultra(slow) relax background priority
-Create new 64-bit/384kHz master recording in Wavelab (0db gain)

As reported in Wavelab:
-Original 16/44 - Apparent Bit Resolution = 16, Peak = -0.098db
-DC Offset Removed - Apparent Bit Resolution = 20, Peak = -0.097db
-Final Recording - Apparent Bit Resolution = 42, Peak = 0.637db

-Resample 64-bit/384kHz to 64-bit/44.1kHz in Wavelab w/crystal resampler ultra(slow) relax background priority
-Apply loudness maximizer (0.01db) and MBIT+ 16-bit Dither (Noise Shaping - Medium, Dither Amount - High, Auto-blanking - on) in Wavelab w/Izotope Ozone 5 VST Plugin
-Flac encode level 0 with Trader's Little Helper
-Tag and pic with xrecode II
